remarks: Limit of the negative function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
neglimc.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
neglimc.g $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> -u B ) $.
neglimc.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
neglimc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( F limCC D ) ) $.
neglimc $p |- ( ph -> -u C e. ( G limCC D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
